name: Mangrove (Iuventa Urban Greening)
description: Planting 100 mangrove seedlings at Bendungan Tukad Mati, a high-erosion coastal area surrounded by residential communities to protect shorelines and boost blue-carbon sinks.

name: Bali Coastal Clean Up
description: Collaborative beach clean-up across Bali's coastal corridor; ~10+ sacks of collected waste to reduce marine debris and improve shoreline resilience.

name: Beraksi Bersama Untuk Lingkungan
description: Community action at Pantai Segara collecting 7 sacks (~40-50 kg) of waste to improve coastal health and community awareness.
